name: Mouse Maid
description:
For those who can not play the browser build of the game or can not be bothered waiting for it to load feel free to download the game below.

Description

Do not let the innocent and adorable graphics fool you for this game will turn that advantage against you as you try the awfully cruel challenge of getting an order to the only customers left in your cafe while avoiding the chef's mess.

Mouse Maid is a very short balancing game made for the Short and Sweet jam in almost one week. As usual with my games most assets are self made.

Controls are simple :3

WASD - move

Mouse - Looks around
